segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I can't believe what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing, water rushing over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pooling on the floor, and she's standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One slip, and she could fall hard on those wet tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy on the stoolâ€” that's even scarier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so high, grabbing cookies from the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting back, legs all uneven.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it gives way, he'll crash down with that plate in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is just watching, reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking treats while mom's oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a quiet garden, totally unaware of the danger here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
